name: DeviceActivitySchedule
desc: A calendar-based schedule for when to monitor a device’s activity.

items.name: init(intervalStart: DateComponents, intervalEnd: DateComponents, repeats: Bool, warningTime: DateComponents?)
var intervalEnd: DateComponents
items.desc: The date components that represent the end time for a schedule’s interval.

items.name: var intervalStart: DateComponents
items.desc: The date components that represent the start time for a schedule’s interval.

items.name: var nextInterval: DateInterval?
items.desc: The schedule’s next interval or the current interval if one is ongoing.

items.name: var repeats: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the schedule recurs.

items.name: var warningTime: DateComponents?
items.desc: Optional components that generate a warning prior to regularly scheduled events.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values aren’t equal.

items.name: static func == (DeviceActivitySchedule, DeviceActivitySchedule) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.
